Really clean picture and clear audio, this copy doesn't pixelate as much (if any) on the fast motion scenes like the other earlier releases did and it's a lot brighter and there's no flicker...
All in all a Great copy for a TS and is well worth the download if your not wanting to wait for a DVDRip... Very watchable and the best I've seen on here...                        
Many Thanx to GreatMagician and Kingdom-Release for the Great rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a steady download...:)
